snippet.title: Sonic Electro Block - Fangame Trailer
snippet.description:
Sonic Electro Block

Project Leaders: 
Pedro Victor "Pvic" Gonçalves (@PvicPlays)

We (from Electro Block) are very proud to announce our last fangame before getting into the indie market... it can be a bit too early, too late.. Who knows? We just want to say thank you to everyone from the team that is helping to create the best we can: The Beta testers, musicians, developers, level designers, etc. And obviously the people that play our games, the guys that are helping us to be here right now.

A remix of old and new, Stages from past projects return reimagined. 7 in-stage collectable chaos emeralds, Multiple references to other fangames! All Stages from Sonic Friction are back, Stages from non-Electro Block fangames are also being reimagined. Knuckles exclusive pathways & Stages! Multiple Character Skins! Online multiplayer from Sonic Network Land!

Stay Tuned for much more.

Follow Us:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/electro_block
Website: https://electro-block.webnode.com/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pvic
Discord: https://goo.gl/GEss2i
